content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.SalesOrderNumber') AS OrderNumber,
       JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.CustomerName') AS Customer,
      MonDoc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeiysvrck.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/json/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
  ) WITH (MonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) as rows
